backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing products, purchases, sessions, and access control with initialization logic and predefined products.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend features, affected files, and confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML bootstrap mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App always renders the discontinued LoginPage and notification toasts with authentication disabled.
frontend/src/components/Banner.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a banner component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright info and a caffeinated.ai attribution link with gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header showing the shop logo, username, optional admin badge, and logout button.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays product details with image, price, and sold-out overlay along with a select button.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseDialog.t: Modal dialog showing product details and sending purchase requests with loading and sold‑out handling.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Wraps children in next-themes provider enabling system-based dark/light mode.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Empty file intended for a user profile setup component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to user identity and invalidates related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomAuth.ts: Zustand store for simple username-based auth with persistence and allowed-user checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity auth context using Dfinity AuthClient with login, clear, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseRequestVis: Zustand store that tracks hidden purchase request IDs with persistence support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching products and purchases and performing purchase-related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus theme variables, dark mode tokens, and utility animations.
frontend/src/lib/productImage.ts: Utility that returns a product’s image data URL or null if unavailable.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry mounting React with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface for managing purchases and products, including creation, review, and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page displaying discontinued notice with disabled authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: React page that fetches and displays normal and free products in tabbed grids, manages a selected product, and auto-refetches when dialogs close.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, fonts, and enabling animation and typography plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s discontinued state, listing existing features and a pending request related to login-screen discontinuation behavior.
